Browse the source code of llvm/polly/lib/External/isl/has_single_reference_templ.c

1#define xFN(TYPE,NAME) TYPE ## _ ## NAME
2#define FN(TYPE,NAME) xFN(TYPE,NAME)
3
4/* Does "obj" have a single reference?
5 * That is, can "obj" be changed inplace?
6 */
7isl_bool FN(TYPE,has_single_reference)(__isl_keep TYPE *obj)
8{
9 if (!obj)
10 return isl_bool_error;
11 return obj->ref == 1;
12}
